website_summaries.verdict: Helmet with lots of color combination choices. Sized for people with smaller heads, like many women and young people.
pros: Lightweight fiberglass shell provides comfort and durability
cons: Runs very small, almost like they are kids' sizes

customer_reviews.title: If you're between sizes, choose the larger size.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet for riding my electric longboard, and I gotta say it's probably the best full face helmet you can get for the price. As others have said, the helmet fits pretty snug. But you really only notice it when taking the helmet on or off. There weren't many pictures of the helmet without the visor (which is how most longboarders use these helmets), so I took my own in case anyone was curious
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fits a one year old!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 14 month old. I was unsure if it would work, and at first my son tried to keep pulling it off. But I bumped him on the head a couple times to let him understand what a helmet does and once I start moving he holds on and stops fiddling w the helmet. It looks awesome and I’m just psyched I have something to keep him protected. Technically he isn’t even supposed to be on the bike yet lol so I’m glad I have some overkill protection for him
customer_reviews.author: edward b

customer_reviews.title: It’s a tight fit.
customer_reviews.text: This helmet seems very well made and airy so it should be good. My only issue is that its very tight especially in the Jaw bar. I have a fairly square jaw and this makes it hard to find a good helmet. I’ve had this issue with Bell products before even their motorcycle gear. I’m happy otherwise and I’m going to use it.
customer_reviews.author: joe scruggs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent full face protection with ventialtion
customer_reviews.text: The large helmet fit well for my sons head who had 7 1/2 hat size, snug with some wiggle room without being too loose or too tight. If gives excellent full face protection while providing good ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: paulknolan

customer_reviews.title: Already saved me once
customer_reviews.text: So my head met a rock at 30 mph after a jump went bad. Works pretty well if you ask me :)
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B.

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet. Horrible sizing!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is awesome. Comfortable, light weight, cool paint scheme. Nicely ventilated and easy clip neck strap. Perfect for mountain biking. I wouldn't recommend for extreme downhill. Get a dirt bike helmet for that! Lost a star because sizing is completely wrong. My son's head measured on the low side of a small. I took all the reviewer's advice and ordered a medium. Glad i did because he's on the tight side of a medium. As the padding compresses it will fit him better. He's 12 with an average size head. Take everyone's advice and order the next size bigger than what you measure!
customer_reviews.author: kaotik

customer_reviews.title: Quality Helmet.  Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews on size, I realized that it would be smaller. I have two boys on the smaller side of the small and medium size chart and it actually fit perfect for bpth of them. So, would say .5 - 1" smaller than stated. But, an awesome helmet. Exceeded expectations. Quality product. If your kids like mountain biking, don't fool with silly regular biking helmets, get a legitimate face and head protective helmet. Unfortunately ordered after horrible accident that left son with stitches on chin and road rash all over face (while wearing an ordinary biking helmet). Be the proactive good parent and get your kid this helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Donny

customer_reviews.title: Tight at first
customer_reviews.text: Pretty tight fit for a large but it did seem to loosen a bit after a bit of use. Still a great deal and I'd buy it again. I purchased a large and my head diameter was within the measurements. Cheeks are still a bit tight but at least it doesn't move around.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: Okay it’s not all about looks. I also wear a Bell Helmet when I ride my motorcycle. I never liked the regular bike helmet design so this was a much better option as it is not only better looking but provides full face protection. My only small gripe is I wish it had a D ring instead of a plastic buckle. I recommend and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Saved my boy already from a face plant onto concrete avoiding another ER visit
customer_reviews.text: My little boy suffered a concussion from a bike fall while he was wearing a regular helmet which ended up in an ER visit. Purchased this BMX helmet bc I used to race BMX. Fast forward 2 weeks, neighbour who hired this 70 year old man leaves ladder across sidewalk at dusk. My boy does not see the ladder and goes flying face first. While he suffered a couple scratches on his legs his face was fully protected by helmet. Got home and frontal protection on helmet was scratched by the concrete. Avoiding a concussion on a 7 year old and another trip to the ER... best purchase we have ever made!!!
customer_reviews.author: the clevelander

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic return service. Don’t trust
customer_reviews.text: Pathetic service. The small size that I had ordered as advertised, did not fit me. When I returned the item, the seller deducted about $10 from the total price I had paid?!
customer_reviews.author: Neil Dsouza

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and light weight.  Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to ride my Rad Rover ebike to work and it fits well and is well made. The cheeks were tight at first but I stretched them out with my hands and that helped it fit perfectly...updating after riding with it for a couple of weeks . Fots comfortably and has more cushion throughout. My only complaint is the screw holding the visor fell out one night and I didnt realize till later . I had no idea they were loose . Please send me a replacement. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sean Berkebile

customer_reviews.title: Don't even notice it until you need it, then it works.
customer_reviews.text: GOOD I've done 5 full days of downhill MTB and this helmet is so comfortable you don't even notice it's on, unless it's sweltering. I crashed and would have hit the side of my face but it saved me, with no bruising at all. Plus it looks good. I get compliments. BAD The only downside is that at this price point you don't get a removable washable liner. It's glued in. I use a strong garden hose and shampoo to deep clean it.
customer_reviews.author: NYC and Country Couple

customer_reviews.title: This helmet has been perfect for my young son who loves to ride bmx
customer_reviews.text: This helmet has been perfect for my young son who loves to ride bmx. This was the 4th full face helmet that we tried and the only one we kept. For size reference, he’s 2.5 (although the size of a typical 3-4 year old) and is wearing a size small helmet. We actually ordered the extra small, but it would not fit on his head. The padding inside make this fitted and very comfortable for him. It doesn’t move around or squeeze his face. It also fits my 5 year old, although I’d probably buy him a medium if he needed to wear it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Visor screws!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed the visor screws, I contact Bell customer service and They do not give any solution. These screws are easily lost !!
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Arevalo A.

customer_reviews.title: Light, affordable, not heavy duty but works
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight full face helmet for bmx, biking and lower speed Moto. My 5YO wears it mainly for electric dirtbike riding. I had trouble fitting him for kids mx helmets and they are very heavy. This is light but lightly constructed. I wouldn't use this for gas powered bikes except maybe a pw50. Fits the purpose of a young kid starter helmet well.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice helmet for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice helmet for the price. I use it for freestyle Jet Skiing. It dries out fine. The issues are it's kind of heavy and the cheek pads are very tight. I got it wet and shoved a football into the cheek pads for a couple days to loosen them up. It worked pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I did some measurements for my head and saw that at the time of they didn't have my size so I just got the largest and it fits great! It feels great on my head and I currently use it for downhill boarding and downhill biking and I just hope I don't have to buy a new one because I crash because this thing it pretty mint!
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice protection and recommend for all aggressive youth riders
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old who has a large head, so it's a bit heavy for him. It's also could use more vents because he gets really sweaty during the warmer months. Definitely can tell it's going to be more protective on the trails than the cheaper full face helmet that carries the bell name at the local big box stores. So far it hasn't been crash-tested, but it gives this mom peace of mind after my 6 year old lost 2 teeth going endo with just a regular helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: great value for money
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable. some complained about the padding around the jaw line being too tight. for my face and head its vey comfortable. i wear it in high 90degree weather and it’s comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Rokni

customer_reviews.title: Great value, but sizing is important
customer_reviews.text: Love the helmet for the price. Be careful on the sizing. I bought a Medium which fit my head, but was very tight on the cheeks and sides. Go one size bigger to be more comfortable. If it's too big, a helmet sock can take care of that.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore J.

customer_reviews.title: Light, sturdy, great price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality helmet. I use it for my boys for atv riding. It is sturdy and light weight and protects their heads. I also love the chin clip, so much better than the D rings that come with most helmets. Of all the helmets I've tried for my boys, this is the best. Have bought multiple helmets they are so great.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Eagle

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and good quality. gets a bit hot but its expected.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet at Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great helmet at a great price. You can trust the manufacturer name as they've been around for a long time and you can trust your child skull to this quality helmet. It fit exactly as anticipated per the measurement instructions included in the description. It came exactly when they advised us and the packaging was sturdy enough to withstand inept delivery.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMags

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: For under $100 this helmet is solid. Everything about it works. The only complaint I have is it doesn't keep your head as cool as I would like. Of course, I've been riding in 90-degree weather as of late so I'm sure my grievance will change soon enough this fall. Other than that I've already dumped several times after sending it over some good gaps and this helmet has held up. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M Symphony

customer_reviews.title: This is a youth helmet.
customer_reviews.text: My head measures 57cm/22.5”. This helmet is much too tight for the advertised size range (55-57cm). My local bike shop has Bell youth, full-face BMX helmets and the mediums fit exactly the same. That said, it seems like a good helmet for a child.
customer_reviews.author: J. Arris

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable for longer rides.
customer_reviews.text: Get a FOX Rampage helmet only $30 more for better quality. I got this Helmet because of the Nitro Circus livery. It's beautiful. But very much poorly designed. Don't get me wrong it'll protect you very well in a crash. But who ever designed this helmet has never worn it. The straps are cheap crap off walmart helmets and for $90 I expected better. It weighs 2.25lbs and that is only 1lbs lighter than a DOT approved helmet for a motorcycle. and the chinstrap is always pressing against your jaw, and the lining is very hard. This helmet will get the job done. But I will never but the Sanction again.
customer_reviews.author: Prison Mike

customer_reviews.title: Descent value
customer_reviews.text: Descent value. Seems well made. I Bought for my 4.5 year old son after he scrapped his chin at the bike park... Trying to avoid future dentist bills! I wish it had some adjustability. Took a couple tries for the little guy to get used to it going over his ears. He loves it now!
customer_reviews.author: S2G

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are quite small and need an extra-large size
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful well constructed helmet. However, the first time I ordered the Large size helmet it was a size Small, in a box labeled Large. The replacement size Large this time was sent out quickly but it was way to small for my 14 year old grandson. Unfortunately, they do not have an extra-Large size available.
customer_reviews.author: Lester Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Solid Helmet For The Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality biking helmet. It is made well with quality materials. The helmet has good coverage. I have yet to take a hard fall and hit my head, but I am confident the helmet would keep me safe. It runs a little on the small side. My head also gets pretty hot when I am biking hard on warm days. The flat black looks cool. Pros: Lightweight Looks cool Quality construction Cons: Runs a bit small My head gets hot
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old boy with 20”head
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is for my 3 year old with a 20” head and it fits him well. We planned to use it for riding on a Gator, sledding, etc. We just need to work on him pulling his head out of it by putting his weight down instead of trying to rise up with the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: The Hot Tottie

customer_reviews.title: Great looking helmet - fit is a little snug
customer_reviews.text: If you're in the market for any helmet, Bell is a respected brand and make quality products. I went for this one as I already own one of their motorcycle helmets. I wanted some extra protection for across the face, but with enough room to breath. This one fits the bill. It's a little snug/tight (so err on the size of larger if you're between sizes), but otherwise it's great.
customer_reviews.author: howard ej packham

customer_reviews.title: good price and nice design
customer_reviews.text: I have this helmet for about two months. It is very confortable, although it is not the slightest. I would say that for the price range, is a very good option. Another concern is that it is not suitable for really hot weather (e.g. summer time in Alabama). If you want to protect without invest too much money, this helmet is definetely a good option.
customer_reviews.author: DjPijama

customer_reviews.title: Just A little tight on the mouth cheeks.
customer_reviews.text: I will have to use caution when the ride gets to tense. Just got to make sure I dont open my mouth while going down the hill or I will bite the inside Of my mouth off. Its just A bit tight on my cheeks. It compresses them but A ferm fit after all. This will save me some brain damage.
customer_reviews.author: jlaw

customer_reviews.title: waaaaay too small
customer_reviews.text: I measured my head with a cloth ruler 3 times to be sure and the size measured within the large size. I could barely get this helmet on, and when I did my cheeks were pushed together. Way too tight and instant headache. I wish they made an XL. Helmet is super light weight.

customer_reviews.title: This Bell Helmet Rules!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son loves this helmet! He wears a medium youth size and I got him the large which fit perfectly. It's light, cool looking, and protects his face as well. I got it because he recently crashed and injured his face during the crash. It's adjustable strap works well under his chin and stays put! I recommend this helmet for piece of mind! I plan to purchase another bell for my other son as well. Enjoy...
customer_reviews.author: J. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Snug but light
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this wouldn’t fit, but the XS fits our lil’ almost-3-year-old great. His head is 19” circumference. He loves how it looks, and I like that I don’t worry so much about him face-planting into a curb when zooming down hills. His “normal” foam helmet seems to give no protection except to the back of his head. This is probably overkill for most situations, but is light enough that he likes wearing it on routine rides. I would definitely think about getting the next size up when he outgrows this.
customer_reviews.author: Beroe

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality for value and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, feels premium built and comfortable once you break it in I have a big head so I had to break it in Other than that it is very comfortable to wear, very very breathable. Happy with this purchase overall
customer_reviews.author: E.Q.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old who loves mountain biking with me. We are planning our first downhill bike park trip next month. Got this helmet for him to use on the trip he is so excited and the fit was very good got him a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Actuallyreally

customer_reviews.title: Nice but super tight on the jaw / face
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice helmet but super tight on the fit. I measured and ordered the recommend size based on my measurements and while my HEAD fits just fine, I have a prominent jaw line which causes my lower cheeks to be entirely squished (uncomfortably) in this helmet. Not sure if even going up a size would help. The facial portion of the helmet is very narrow. Perhaps it would fit better on a female with less of a jaw, or on a male with a smaller face.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Teeth saver
customer_reviews.text: I ride my scooter no longer in fear of losing my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong design, sized a few cm too small
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the large sized blue/white/yellow "Spackle" designed helmet. The one I received was not the design I ordered. I got a design that isn't even displayed. Colors are similar, but not the same. It's a minor gripe, but the distributor should check inside the boxes because your product stickers do not match the helmets. Fitment is a couple of centimeters too small. I have a 58cm dome and while this says to fit up to 60cm, I highly doubt it would do it comfortably. Other than that, product is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Will C.

customer_reviews.title: A must have piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Greatest money saver. Ever scratch on the chin guard reminds me how important safty is for little ones. She jumped up after her first big crash and said "I didn't feel a thing." Other kids give her compliments, saying how cool it looks. She's a little badass.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Fries

customer_reviews.title: after 7 stitches in my face i bought a helmet
customer_reviews.text: i just got into another bike incident broke my collarbone into 4 pcs doing 18mph but since i was wearing this helmet and gloves my hands and face are good! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan F.

customer_reviews.title: Weak, Heavy
customer_reviews.text: You can literally bend and flex the face protection with just a little pressure from your hands. The shell is basically a thin piece of plastic, and it’s hot and heavy. Do not but, spend $50 more on a better helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Dowden

customer_reviews.title: I got the largest size they have so it's not like I could've done something different
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is too tight on my cheaks. Not really usable for me. I got the largest size they have so it's not like I could've done something different. I'm not a bucket head either. I wear a size 7 1/4 hat in fitted hats and I'm have a pretty lean face shape.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great value and look for Esk8 and bmx
customer_reviews.text: Tight around cheeks Initially but great value and look for Esk8
customer_reviews.author: Brandon K

customer_reviews.title: Cheek pads on Large are too tight
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying this to fit a large head, it might not be the right choice. Seems like a fine quality helmet, and it was delivered promptly, but there is no way to adjust the fit. The cheek pads are too tight, and not adjustable. We bought a large. There is not an extra large, so there is no option to try for a better fit. Manual tells you to check the fit, but contains no instructions for how to adjust it. The only adjustable part is the chin strap.
customer_reviews.author: V. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet, strap padding could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight helmet that fits as expected. Bought for my son who races bmx. A little disappointed in the strap as the padding seems a little thin. This helmet does not feel as good a quality as our older bell helmet. My son has had a couple of spills and the helmet looks great. No complaints from my boy.
customer_reviews.author: S Fairclough

customer_reviews.title: One of the best available
customer_reviews.text: It is a ver light weight helmet and it is actually very confortable and with a lot of air venta so it is not claustrophobic at all. I enjoy using it on the trails! I also added a camera pod on it
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely on the small size. My head size is 53mm so I ordered small in accordance to the sizing chart but it was way too small. I would say order a size larger for sure with this helmet. Quality is not all that great. Good for a kid but not for a discerning adult.
customer_reviews.author: Fazzster

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: The Large helmet said it's supposed to fit 58-60 cm head, however that's not the case. This doesn't even fit a 58 cm head. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sanka

customer_reviews.title: padding was broken next day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet to give it as a gift to my niece who lives in India. I took the helmet with me safely in the original box when I travelled to India. The next we noticed before wearing it , one padding piece was broken. How can I replace it now?
customer_reviews.author: Sunil Patil

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, affordble helmet
customer_reviews.text: Finally I can trail ride without worrying about busting my teeth out. Great quality, true to size, snug yet comfortable fit, lightweight, decent venting.
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: Great value light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It fits well. Cheek pads felt very tight but the more I wore it the better they got. Helmet is light and has decent ventilation. It's great for a 6 hours day at the bike park. Very happy with it. For the price can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and had to re-order in size large for him, he's 8. Now it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Chubby

customer_reviews.title: Nice and lightweight for 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, lightweight. Fits my 6 year old son perfect with some room to grow even. He rides BMX motocross and this works well for him.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lichtenberg

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight full protection!
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! Nice and lightweight with full head/face protection. My husband commutes by bike everyday and loves wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Rambles

customer_reviews.title: Don't go by the Bell sizing chart!
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty sturdy. But too small. The Bell sizing chart is full of crap. According to their sizing chart the medium should be good up to 23.25' I'm at 22.75' And I can barely get it on. It's tight as hell. If you're within one inch of the max head size. Go up one size!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great full face helmet option for smaller kids.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my child well. One of the best reviewed helmets for smaller kids. My 3 year old has a head circumference of 51 cm. The small size fits him well. Agree with another reviewer that it would be nice if the inside padding was removable for ease of cleaning. No too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sized really small
customer_reviews.text: Size chart isn’t even close. Average head sizes based on chart is medium but a medium is snug on my 13 year old daughter. Go bigger than recommended
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is cool looking and tough as nails. My 7 yr old son Matthew loves it! Thanks Bells for making cool products
customer_reviews.author: Manyi chung

customer_reviews.title: I love this helmet its great
customer_reviews.text: I love this helmet its great, pretty light weight and just has a good feel to I ordered mine a Saturday and got it the following Monday but when it came in everything package wize was great but I tried the helmet on and it was too tight so I'm sending it back and getting a new one.....NOTE these helmets run small because I tried on mediums at my local bike store and they fit fine but I ordered a medium in this helmet and it was too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ritz

customer_reviews.title: Saved us from a hospital visit
customer_reviews.text: An old man left his ladder across the sidewalk at dusk and my 6 year old did not see it. He went flying about 4 feet forward and landed face first on the pavement. Who knows what the damage would have been to his face
customer_reviews.author: the clevelander

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for my 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 4 year old perfectly and according to the measurements/ I’m not a fan of the chin strap, but can overlook it/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But after a few rides it has become comfortable enough so I barely notice
customer_reviews.text: I'm an adult and the large is a very snug fit especially around the jaw granted i have a large head. I would have gone for an xl but large is the only option here. But after a few rides it has become comfortable enough so I barely notice. Great helmet for the price and I like the idea that it has a chin gaurd especially when getting whacked by branches. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Runs small and the cheek pads are tight as heck
customer_reviews.text: A awesome helmet for the price, very light super good-looking helmet but the cheek pads were way way too tight and it definitely run small glad I bought a large even though I normally wear a medium, anyway I cut some of the cheek padding out and re stitched it so if you have the ability to do that I would recommend this helmet I would have given it 5 Stars if the cheap pads weren't so tight
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie tamplen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your face pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet I was right between a M and L. Decided to go with the M. Have the GoPro mounted to the top which works well. Haven't wrecked yet but the helmet feels pretty safe and sturdy. 4 stars due to the super tight pads on my cheeks, still better than loose pads though if you ask me. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: CCKRUSE

customer_reviews.title: fits him awesome! It is a little big but in our ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4.5 year old son, fits him awesome! It is a little big but in our Michigan summers we only have a few months until we pack up bikes for the season and wait until next year and wanted to get 2 seasons out of it. Impressed with the quality and feel it provides adequate safety for him at the skate park and the track
customer_reviews.author: Savanna

customer_reviews.title: Durable solid protection
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and semi breathable but does it's job when it counts. Had my first full on face plant at Bailey's this past weekend and walked away with no head or brain damage. Now I need some shin guards too lol
customer_reviews.author: Eric Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Small but worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully, however it is pretty narrow. My 8 year old has a larger head, and this is extremely snug on him, but he loves the look, it matches his bike perfectly and protects his head.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Beard

customer_reviews.title: Kids actually wear it
customer_reviews.text: This was a great hit because my 9 & 11 year old boys thought it looked cool. Tricky to get on, but a neighbor showed them how to use the side tabs to pull it apart as you put it on so it doesn't fold your ears over. Fits snuggly and works well for the Go Karts.
customer_reviews.author: HLD

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large and it fits good. Seems like the sizes run small because m I’m not that big so a big dude may not fit in a large. I think it’s sized for teenagers likely. Mine fits and is great!
customer_reviews.author: Chad van Delden

customer_reviews.title: Nice Helmet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old grandson's birthday. He is very happy with it. I got the size large and it fits well and is light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Horse Lover

customer_reviews.title: NOT MEANT FOR ADULTS
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is listed in the title as "Adult Full Face Bike Helmet", I can tell you that it is not made for adults. Entirely too small. I picked the Medium based on the chart, and my head felt like it would explode from the pressure points. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protects and comfortable padding
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a friends bday gift. Says it fit just right and used it mountain biking. Couldn’t stop showing it haha
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight helmet for Mtn Biking son
customer_reviews.text: My son is thrilled with his new helmet. He loves bright colors. I love that I can see him coming on the Mountain bike courses. He likes that he feels safer in it --- says he can crash now without worrying about smashing his face! Mom hopes it doesn't come to that!
customer_reviews.author: A. Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. This overprotective mom makes her kid wear this when scootering and it has definitely saved him from some face injuries. Easy for kid to take on and off and not too heavy. Colors are cool too
customer_reviews.author: Veegree

customer_reviews.title: DHMTB approved!
customer_reviews.text: I use the helmet for downhill MTB and works great! Being that I have ridden MX most of my life this helmet was much lighter, and still very strong. Bought a large based trying a few on at my local bike shop and matching the head circumference with my hats.
customer_reviews.author: joseph Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, it’s light and looks sturdy, perfect for riding. Be careful as sizes run really small. My son has a 51cm head and only just squeezed into the small size. Could be because the padding is plush out of the box. I expect the helmet to fit better after use. The Seller sent everything on time and in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kerley

customer_reviews.title: Crash Tested and it works!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a value helmet on a Whistler trip because my son forgot his . Shipped quick. He crashed hard at speed and this helmet worked. Thanks Bell!
customer_reviews.author: MFinSD

customer_reviews.title: It's light, comfortable, and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is surprisingly light. It is also very comfortable and riding for a couple hours is very manageable. I have yet to get in an accident with it, but I have a lot of confidence it its ability to protect my brain bits.
customer_reviews.author: Kameron

customer_reviews.title: Get for your kid
customer_reviews.text: Ultra light we got this for my 3 year old fits great and is super light wieght.
customer_reviews.author: jason spillett

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This is a good helmet it fits my 4 year old really well. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Hill

customer_reviews.title: Size medium is a bit tight. I suggest sizing up
customer_reviews.text: Nice helmet but men's medium is a bit tight. I suggest sizing up for a 22" head.
customer_reviews.author: Active4

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: just as described! our little guy love sit for BMX racing. He is 2 years old and it fits him perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: doug shehan jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality lightweight helmet!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this helmet for our 3 year old grandson. It fits perfect, for s lightweight and offers the face/head protection we wanted. Great helmet for a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Runs super small. Found out after I ordered it was intended toward "youth" audience.
customer_reviews.author: Caryssa O

customer_reviews.title: my cheeks like look i to belong chipmunk family
customer_reviews.text: it's a snug fit. Once i put it on, my cheeks like look i to belong chipmunk family. quality: it's not ahigh end helmet. plastic molding with hard styrofoam.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great Seller!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this helmet. I had to replace it once, because I bought he small and didn't fit very well. The seller was really nice and help with the exchange without charging anything extra. Really good quality and i hope my son never has to "really" use it :-)
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Caldas

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect on his head
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my shorter 12 year old son. He loves it. Fits perfect on his head, he's got relatively long hair.
customer_reviews.author: SonnyE2

customer_reviews.title: need M/L half sizes
customer_reviews.text: the difference between medium and large is only about 35 hundreds of an inch! thats not alot of wiggle-room - but I'd still say these helmets run small /tight (but no XL sorry) also** the customer wondering about wide checks might have a good concern! otherwise very comfortable decent quality helmet! worth the price! im an adult with ~22.0
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great full face bike helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is my son's and he loves it. We bought a medium instead of a small because we wanted the black one and it works great for my 4 year old. It's really light and he wears it to the BMX track to race.
customer_reviews.author: Labboro

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is a legit helmet for a great price. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kibadbo

customer_reviews.title: Very tight on face but good quality and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, which is nice. Looks great too. Medium is quite snug on my face though, and I'm a fine boned, petite woman. Uncomfortably tight on my face/jaw. Hoping it will break in over time.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C

customer_reviews.title: Bad business credit.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not good. The only product I received was the right box. The product itself is scratched and the color is not right. It's not the style I want at all. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: CHEN YI CHUN

customer_reviews.title: small sizes and narrow
customer_reviews.text: At first I got the M size (since it is my size at other helmets as well) and it was too small. Got the L and still narrow at the chin. But all considers- great helmet for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Protect your noggin.
customer_reviews.text: Helmet is VERY snug on the face, thick pads. I'm hoping with time they break it and give a little more. However it's a helmet, I'll accept the squish face for a safe face.
customer_reviews.author: Tory Lewis

customer_reviews.title: ... light enough for my 3 year old and fits excellent. Buckle is easy as well
customer_reviews.text: Helmet is plenty light enough for my 3 year old and fits excellent. Buckle is easy as well. Only gripe is the padding around the base of the helmet that gets rubbed by jaw/ears during removal disconnected pretty quick (literally a half dozen uses). We reglued the pads and now remove the helmet with great care.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: comfortable, good field of vision and best of all...wont knock your brains out on a fall down. i am a small adult at about 5'6 120 lbs. i dont have a big head but i bought a large. i wear a small - med flex fit hat and still got a large. its perfect
customer_reviews.author: Andrew cox

product_meta.title: Bell Sanction Adult Full Face Bike Helmet
product_meta.description:
FULL-9'S RAD LITTLE BROTHER. At just 850 grams, the Sanction is our low-profile full-face helmet aimed at dirt shredders and BMX riders who don't need the more robust Full-9 or Transfer-9. The Sanction has become the choice of adults who want full-face protection but prefer a smaller size and profile. If you're riding a chairlift, go with a Full-9 or Transfer-9. But if you're pedaling BMX or dirt jumps, this helmet will serve you well.

AMAZON.COM
With aggressive, moto-inspired styling, the Sanction is a smaller, lightweight, full-face helmet for BMX, Super-D, and all-mountain riding. Weighing in at just 950 grams, the Sanction has 15 vents for optimum airflow and its low-profile design is sized smaller for younger riders. Featuring a hand laminated fiberglass shell for lightweight strength and offered at a recession-busting value, the Sanction is ready for anything.

 Specifications:

 * Weight: 950 grams / 33.5 ounces 
 * Vents: 15 
 * Strap Color: Black 
 * Usage: BMX Race 
 * Certifications: CE EN1078, CPSC Bicycle 

 Size Specifications:

 * Small: 52 to 54 centimeters / 20.45 to 21.25 inches 
 * Medium: 55 to 57 centimeters / 21.65 to 22.45 inches 
 * Large: 58 to 60 centimeters / 22.8 to 23.6 inches 

 About Bell:
More world champions have worn Bell Helmets than all other helmet brands combined. From Grand Prix racing through the Indy 500 to Olympic cycling, Bell helmets have played a vital role in protecting sports men and women for nearly 50 years. Bell began as a small auto parts store in a suburb of Los Angeles. Growing under the leadership of Roy Richter, Bell became a leader in safety equipment for auto racing, motorcycling, and then bicycling. Richter's commitment to creating great product through a close connection with the sport, along with his trust of and care for the people who worked for him, turned Bell from a one-man operation into a multi-million dollar enterprise. His legacy lives on today in Bell's commitment to racing, quality, and innovation.
feature_bullets: ABS SHELL CONSTRUCTION with Adjustable Visor
LIGHTWEIGHT FULL-FACE - offers comfort and protection for dirt jump or BMX riders who want a smaller size and profile
SPECIFICATIONS - X-Small (48-51 cm), Small (52-54 cm), Medium (55-57 cm), and Large (58-60 cm) Sizes; 15 Helmet vents; CPSC Bicycle, CE EN1078 Certifications
